descriptions: ['DescriptionLuxhabitat is proud to present this rare to find 2-bed apartment located in Belgravia 2 in Jumeirah Village Circle. The apartment, a community facing unit with a good open view of JVC. This apartment is rented at 115,000/ per year. It also features a 3.2-meter ceiling, with floor to ceiling glass windows, a well-equipped kitchen fitted with a microwave and state of the art bathrooms. The home also offers a large balcony. The apartment is chiller free and offers a temperature-controlled swimming pool, state of the art gym with Technogym equipment. Lobbies are complemented with work station and local art, along with free wifi in all common areas. The community area also boasts a plush lounge for residents that bring the outdoors, inside. In short, Belgravia is the new favourite for homeowners as well as for those owners who want to give out their properties for rent and value aesthetics and design along with contemporary community living.\nJumeirah Village is a residential and commercial community featuring a mixture of Arabic and Mediterranean villas and stylish townhouses. Covering two distinct areas the Triangle and the Circle, Jumeirah Village comprises a variety of residences, offices, commercial, retail and leisure facilities spread over 811 hectares. Jumeirah Village offers residents a real sense of community living. Coming soon to Jumeirah Village are two new developments: Al Khail Avenue at Jumeirah Village Triangle and The Circle Mall at Jumeirah Village Circle.']

descriptions: ['DescriptionProvident Real Estate is pleased to present this stunning 3 bedroom for Sale in Al Reem 1.-3 Bedroom + Study + Maids Room-One of the Amazing Location & View of Al Reem 1.Pictures are generic but original pictures can be provided on demand.-Lake View-Landscaped Garden -Trees up to 15m Long-Well Maintained Villa-Single RowAl Reem(Also known as Gazelle)Gazelle is a 208-acre themed villa community development with three themed, gated communities which front an expansive lake built in two levels. Inspired by the beauty of the desert and the grace of the Arabian Gazelle, this multi-million dirham development comprises luxurious villas which incorporate elements from traditional Arabic and Spanish architecture.What sets this neighborhood apart from the others is its modernity and startling panoramic view of Arabian Desert all the way to its breathtaking landscape and surroundings which include lush greenery, lakes, the Arabian Ranches Golf Club and the Dubai Polo and Equestrian Club.\nCall Saddam Ahmad (BRN 41343) on +971559877957 or visit www.providentestate.com.']
